name: Fury Race
description:
Do you want to become a road king? Then hit the pedal and break through the enemy line. You should be not only the fastest one but also the most precise and brave one.
Feel the thrill of speed and deep satisfaction of an extreme drive.

Take part in a death race: your main goal is to survive and destroy all your rivals.

  • Choose a car in the garage;
  • Tune your car to make it faster and more dangerous;
  • Start the race with other rivals: you should be not only the fastest one, you should survive the race;
  • Turn every rival to scrap pile and win.

FEATURES:
  • Breathtaking derby car race;
  • Customizable armored cars;
  • Mighty rivals to compete with;
  • Various locations and extreme tracks;
  • Chance to become the new road king.
